extension.summary: Stream Latest Nollywood Movies in Full HD
extension.description:
Watch the hottest 2025 Nollywood releases from diverse Nollywood actors and actresses — streamed directly from YouTube.

Features:
• Latest Movies • Action • Romance • Comedy • Drama
• Real-time search (always fresh content)
• Beautiful posters & plots (optional TMDB)
• Zero setup — installs official YouTube addon automatically
• Works on Firestick, Android Box, Windows, Linux, Raspberry Pi

No login. No subscription. No buffering.
Just install → add your free YouTube API key → enjoy unlimited Nollywood!
extension.disclaimer: This addon does not host or distribute any video files. All content is streamed directly from public, embeddable YouTube videos. Users are responsible for complying with YouTube ToS and local laws.
